title: making more cinematics
body:
I have so many ideas that league of legends can make like for example:
Sion in a lumberjack skin in a horror cinematic or Rek'sai (the new champ) breaking the ground as she tunnels  through or like they did with Kalistas little movie . 
In my opinion it would be great to see more awesome cinematics from league of legends

replies.body: Pretty sure that doesn't mean they can both do everything.....Plus more cinematic brings in more players/income increasing riot's employed game fixers. So they are kinda linked
If people started playing the game because they saw the cinematic, they probably wont play more than 1 or 2 games.
They need to stop making cinematics and start fixing their game.
Pretty sure different teams work on the cinematics and the fixing of the game.
Pretty sure they are both employed from the same company.
and have different probably incompatible skills

If you run a company. And you need 50 employees to work on a project together, but instead you employ 50 employees to work on a cinematic that doesn't even reflect on gameplay at all. Then there is something seriously wrong.
I'm not saying those numbers are accurate, but for every dev working on the cinematic, that is one less dev that could be making is so everything isn't coded as flash, or so Tryndamere can't be smited during his ultimate, or that some abilities aren't coded to act like a minion, or you know? Azir?

For every dev they hired to help with the cinematic, that's one less dev that they could of hired to help making the gameplay completely seamless.

They need to stop including Katarina in them...
